metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20721 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: URI_FUNC() in UriParse.c in uriparser before 0.9.1 has an out-of-bounds read (in uriParse*Ex* functions) for an incomplete URI with an IPv6 address containing an embedded IPv4 address, such as a "//[::44.1" address. It was discovered that uriparser incorrectly handled certain URIs. An attacker could use this vulnerability to cause a crash or possibly leak sensitive information.

criterions.comment: uriparser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
